articles.title: Telegram is the most downloaded mobile app for January 2021 as WhatsApp slips to fifth - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Telegram was #9 on SensorTower's list of most downloaded (non-game) mobile app in December 2020. Fast forward one month, however, and it had jumped up to #1. WhatsApp and Instagram were #3 and #4 at the end of 2020, but fell to #5 and #6 respectively at the s…

articles.title: This brand could soon offer the perfect iPhone 12 mini rival - PhoneArena
articles.description: The perfect iPhone 12 mini rival is reportedly being developed by Asus. The so-called ZenFone mini looks set to offer high-end phones when it launches later this year.
